questions.question: What information does Mrs. Donnelly learn after talking with Mr. Kasigi and Sophie?

choices.answer: Cap has been elected eighth grade president as a prank.
Cap is making a lot of friends and getting good grades.
Rain is feeling better and Cap will soon be returning to Garland.
Cap is working to build a bullfighting ring in the school's parking lot.

questions.question: How does Sophie react when Cap it practicing tai chi on the front lawn?

choices.answer: She goes outside and asks to join him.
She politely asks him to stop.
She dumps a wastebasket of water on his head.
She leaves early for school so she doesn't have to see it.

questions.question: What happened that made Sophie extremely disappointed?

choices.answer: She got in a fight with her dad about Cap.
She failed her driving test.
Her mom and dad are getting a divorce.
Her dad didn't show up for her driving lesson.

questions.question: All of the following pranks leave Cap confused except...

choices.answer: Lorelei Lumley wanting to run her fingers through Cap's hair.
The little white paper balls he keeps finding in his hair.
Why students would want to have bullfighting at the school.
The students asking how he made his corn husk sandals.

questions.question: What does Cap find out about the Halloween Dance?

choices.answer: It's the biggest event of the year and is planned by the president.
He hasn't been invited by anyone.
Lorelei Lumley wants to be his date.
Hugh has never gone because it's too scary.

questions.question: How does Cap react when watching Trigonometry & Tears with Sophie?

choices.answer: He is not interested in watching TV at all.
He talks to the characters like they are real people.
He makes fun of the characters and says the show is stupid.
He sits on the couch all day watching TV.

questions.question: What does Cap do that makes Sophie see how kind he is?

choices.answer: He asks her dad to make up the driving lesson he missed.
He takes her to get her driver's license.
He takes her out for a driving lesson without Mrs. Donnelly knowing.
He washes Sophie's car.

questions.question: Why is Zach starting to feel frustrated?

choices.answer: Mr. Kasigi told him to stop pranking Cap.
Cap isn't reacting to any of their pranks.
Naomi hasn't been helping him plan the pranks anymore.
Cap found out that he was made president as a joke.
